title: Apply CCS logo branding across header, footer, and favicon

requirements.summary: Use the generated CCS logo assets consistently in header brand, footer brand block, and HTML favicon (with correct English alt text).
acceptanceCriteria: Header brand area renders the CCS logo icon from /assets/generated/ccs-logo-icon.dim_256x256.png.
Footer brand area renders the CCS logo icon from /assets/generated/ccs-logo-icon.dim_256x256.png.
The browser tab/favicon uses /assets/generated/ccs-favicon.dim_64x64.png via frontend/index.html.
All logo elements have English alt text that references Complete Construction Solutions (CCS).

file_operations.description: Add the generated CCS square icon logo to public assets so it can be used by header and footer branding.
Add the generated CCS horizontal logo lockup to public assets for any future primary branding usage (even if not currently rendered).
Add the generated CCS favicon to public assets so it can be referenced from frontend/index.html.
Ensure the favicon <link> references /assets/generated/ccs-favicon.dim_64x64.png and remove/avoid any legacy favicon references that conflict with CCS branding.
Ensure the header navigation brand area uses /assets/generated/ccs-logo-icon.dim_256x256.png and set an English alt attribute referencing Complete Construction Solutions (CCS).
Ensure the footer brand block uses /assets/generated/ccs-logo-icon.dim_256x256.png and set an English alt attribute referencing Complete Construction Solutions (CCS).
